Verses: 1 neengal Sudhandhariththukkollumpadi Dhesaththai Seettuppottup Pangidumpodhu, Dhesaththil Irubaththaiyaayirankol Neelamum, Padhinaayirankol Agalamumaana Parisuththa Pangaik Karththarukku Arppidhamaagap Piriththu Vaikkakkadaveergal; Idhu Than Sutrellai Engum Parisuththamaayirukkum.
2 idhile Parisuththa Sthalaththukkendru Ainnooru Kol Neelamum Ainnooru Kol Agalamumaana Naarchadhuram Alakkappadakkadavadhu; Adharku Sutrilum Aimbadhu Muzhamaana Velinilam Irukkavendum.
3 indha Alavu Utpada Irubaththaiyaayirankol Neelaththaiyum Padhinaayirankol Agalaththaiyum Alappaayaaga; Adharkul Parisuththa Sthalamum Magaa Parisuththa Sthalamum Irukkavendum.

4 dhesaththil Parisuththa Pangaagiya Idhu Karththarukku Aaraadhanaiseyya Serugiravargalum, Parisuththa Sthalaththil Aaraadhanai Seygiravargalumaana Aasaariyarudaiyadhu; Idhu Avargalukku Veedugalukkaana Idamum, Parisuththa Sthalaththukku Aduththa Idamumaayirukkavendum.

5 pinnum Irubaththaiyaayirankol Neelamum Padhinaayirankol Agalamumaana Idam Aalayaththin Panividaikkaararaagiya Leviyarudaiyadhaayirukkum; Adhu Avargaludaiya Kaaniyaatchi; Adhil Irubadhu Araiveedugalirukkavendum.

6 parisuththa Pangaagap Padaikkappattadharku Edhire Nagaraththin Kaaniyaatchiyaaga Aiyaayirankol Agalaththaiyum Irubaththaiyaayirankol Neelaththaiyum Alandhu Koduppeergalaaga; Adhu Isravel Vamsaththaaranaivarukkum Sondhamaayirukkum.

7 parisuththa Pangaagap Padaikkappattadharkum Nagaraththin Kaaniyaatchikkum Indhappuraththilum Andhappuraththilum, Parisuththa Padaippukkumunbaagavum, Nagaraththin Kaanikkumunbaagavum, Adhipadhiyinudaiya Pangu Merkile Merpuramaagavum Kizhakkile Keezhppuramaagavum Iruppadhaaga; Adhin Neelam Melellai Thuvakkik Keezh Ellaimattum Pangugalil Ovvondrukkum Edhiraayirukkavendum.

8 idhu Avanukku Isravelile Kaaniboomiyaaga Irukkakkadavadhu; En Adhipadhigal Ini En Janaththai Odukkaamal Dhesaththai Isravel Vamsaththaarukku Avargaludaiya Koththirangalukkuth Thakkadhaaga Vittuviduvaargalaaga.

9 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Isravelin Adhipadhigale, Neengal Seydhadhupodhum; Neengal Kodumaiyaiyum Kollaiyidudhalaiyum Thavirththu, Nyaayaththaiyum Needhiyaiyum Seyyungal; Ungal Uththandangalai En Janaththaivittu Agatrungal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
10 sumuththiraiyaana Tharaasum, Sumuththiraiyaana Marakkaalum, Sumuththiraiyaana Alavukudamum Ungalukku Irukkakkadavadhu.

11 marakkaalum Alavukudamum Ore Alavaayirundhu, Marakkaal Kalaththile Paththil Oru Pangum, Alavukudam Kalaththile Paththil Oru Pangum Pidikkakkadavadhu; Kalaththinpadiye Adhin Alavu Nirunayikkappaduvadhaaga.
12 sekkalaanadhu Irubadhu Keraa; Irubadhu Sekkalum Irubaththaindhu Sekkalum Padhinaindhu Sekkalum Ungalukku Oru Raaththalaagum.
13 neengal Seluththa Vendiya Kaanikkaiyaavadhu: Oru Kalam Kodhumaiyile Oru Marakkaalil Aarilorupangaiyum, Oru Kalam Vaarkodhumaiyile Oru Marakkaalil Aariloru Pangaiyum Padaikkakkadaveergal.
14 alavukudaththaal Alakkira Enneyin Kattalaiyaavadhu: Paththukkudam Pidikkira Kalaththukku Sariyaana Oru Jaadi Enneyile Paththil Oru Pangaip Padaippeergalaaga; Paththu Alavukudam Oru Kalamaagum.

15 isravel Dhesaththile Nallameychchalai Meygira Mandhaiyile Irunooru Aadugalil Oru Aadum, Avargaludaiya Paavanivaaranaththirkaaga Pojanapaliyaagavum Thaganapaliyaagavum Samaadhaanapaliyaagavum Seluththappadakkadavadhendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.
16 isravelin Adhipadhikku Munbaaga Dhesaththin Janangal Ellorum Indhak Kaanikkaiyai Seluththak Kadanaaligalaayirukkiraargal.

17 isravel Vamsaththaar Koodivarak Kurikkappatta Sagala Pandigaigalilum Maadhappirappugalilum Oivunaatkalilum Thaganapaligalaiyum Pojanapaligalaiyum Paanapaligalaiyum Seluththuvadhu Adhipadhiyinmel Sumandha Kadanaayirukkum; Avan Isravel Vamsaththaarukkaagap Paavanivaaranampannumpadikkup Paavanivaaranapaliyaiyum Pojanapaliyaiyum Thaganapaliyaiyum Samaadhaanapaliyaiyum Padaippaanaaga.
18 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Mudhalaammaadham Mudhalaanthedhiyile Nee Pazhudhatra Oru Kaalaiyaik Konduvandhu, Parisuththa Sthalaththukkup Paavanivirththi Seyvaayaaga.

19 paavanivaaranapaliyin Raththaththile Konjam Aasaariyan Eduththu, Aalayaththin Vaasal Nilaigalilum, Palipeedaththu Sattaththin Naalu Kodigalilum, Utpraagaaraththina Vaasalnilaigalilum Poosakkadavan.
20 pizhaiseydhavanukkaagavum, Ariyaamal Thappidham Seydhavanukkaagavum Andhappragaaramaaga Ezhaanthedhiyilum Seyvaayaaga; Ivvidhamaai Aalayaththukkup Paavanivarththi Seyvaayaaga.
21 mudhalaam Maadham Padhinaalaanthedhiyile Pulippillaadha Ap
